title: How can I recover Python code from a self-made Discord EXE tool?
content:
A while ago I created a Discord nuker tool using Python. Later, I converted it into an EXE file (for personal use only), and unfortunately I lost the original .py source files.

Now I need to recover the internal logic/scripts inside the EXE ‚Äî even partial recovery would help.

It was likely packed or obfuscated, and may not have been built with PyInstaller (I can't unpack it using pyinstxtractor).

I'm the original author of this tool, and I can confirm that the EXE was generated from a Python script.

Can anyone suggest a method or tool that could help me unpack or reverse engineer it?

Thank you very much üôè

comments.text: What tool did you use to convert? Did you look into the raw binary with a hex viewer to gain some insight?
